name: Single filer at Additional Medicare Tax boundary
description: Single person earning exactly $200,000 - tests Additional Medicare Tax threshold

sources.description: Calculated using 2025 IRS tax tables - tests Additional Medicare threshold exactly at $200k
sources.notes: At exactly $200,000, no additional Medicare tax applies (kicks in ABOVE $200k). SS capped: $176,100 * 6.2% = $10,918.20. Medicare: $200,000 * 1.45% = $2,900
